title: Toronto Office Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at CDI College (Toronto, ON) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: Good and easy to handle. People were friendly and the interview went well.106 current and former employees responded to a question about how they got an interview at CDI College. The most popular response was through Indeed and the second most popular response was recruiter contacted me.
Interview Questions: Can you tell me about yourself?

title: Assistant Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at CDI College (Brampton, ON) in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: It was good and asked about my previous job experience. and previous role discussed in detail and performance chart. about my qualifications, about my total experience, About KPIs , about why do you want this job..
Interview Questions: It was good and asked about my previous job experience. and previous role discussed in detail and performance chart. about my qualifications, about my total experience, About KPIs , about why do you want this job..

title: Career Services Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CDI College (Mississauga, ON) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a 30 minute process. Questions asked included why I was leaving my current position, my ideas on how to perform well in my role, and certain behavioral scenarios.
Interview Questions: Why are you leaving your current position?

title: Registrar Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CDI College
Interview Descriptions: smooth going well there are only two rounds one by HR and other by hiring manager environment is too good through in person got offer letter in 2 days nd joining in 2 days very quick
Interview Questions: Normal intro and previous experience

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CDI College
Interview Descriptions: - you will receive a phone interview and they would like to know more about your background and experience and expected salary. - the interview is scheduled for 30 mins.
Interview Questions: - Can u let me know more about u? - What's your status in CA? - What's ur expected salary

title: Assistant Director of Admissions Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CDI College (Ottawa, ON) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: As the Assistant Director of the Admission Interview Process at CDI College, I am responsible for overseeing the entire admissions process for prospective students. This includes helping the admissions team coordinate and execute interviews and other activities related to the application process. I also assist in providing guidance and support to the admissions team throughout the entire process. Additionally, I am responsible for tracking and reporting on the progress of each applicant and ensuring that all relevant documents are received and reviewed in a timely manner. I also help to resolve any issues or concerns that arise during the admission process. Finally, I monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of the admission process to ensure that it is meeting the needs of all applicants.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself. How did you achieve monthly targets? How do you deal with conflict in the team How do you deal with a difficult customer?

title: Admissions Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CDI College (Calgary, AB) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions:
I was recruited off of Indeed by the hiring manager for the position. After a basic phone screen, a Teams call with the VP and local Administrator was setup. The Admin was a no-show, so I spoke with the VP for 30-45 minutes. A week or so later, the Admin called, asked a series of basic questions and offered me the position.

I initially accepted the position, but upon receiving the employment contract, it contained too many onerous clauses regarding outside employment and non-competes. I asked for the clauses to be removed or modified, but the HR rep said they wouldn't.
Interview Questions:
Why do you want to work here?

What type of sales style do you use?

How many employees have you managed?

Are you available to work Saturdays and extended hours?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at CDI College
Interview Descriptions:
Group interview of three people.  
Business casual dress code. 
Nice office environment.
One interviewer wrote down my answers.
Quick response for job offer and start date. 
Positive interactions through in person, phone and email communications.
Interview Questions:
Why did you leave your last job?
How did you handle a difficult situation with a client?
What are your best qualities?

title: Assistant Director of Admissions Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at CDI College (Calgary, AB) in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions:
Phone interview,  then video interview with manager.
Each interview takes around 30 minutes.

The final interview took place 2 days after my first interview, both were really easy, because the bar to entry is easy but turnover is high
Interview Questions: describe your sales experience, did you have kpi's

title: Assistant Director of Admissions Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CDI College
Interview Descriptions: less then normal and almost mean less not professional as they hire so many and terminate  after training where their required target is not achievable with the way they distribute leads
Interview Questions: tell me about your self

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at CDI College (Vancouver, BC) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: Applied and received a confirmation email. The next step was to choose a date and time for the phone interview. I selected a time of 3 days from the initial email. No confirmation email from the online scheduling or for the contact person. On the day of, there was no phone call or follow-up. Attempts were made for alternative times through the online portal/recruiting site and no reply.  Very poor service from an online basis educational school.
Interview Questions: What days are you available?

title: Assistant Director of Admissions Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CDI College
Interview Descriptions:
- Basic sales related questions
- 2 rounds of interview
- Looking for people who can communicate well
- Having experience in education sector is a plus
- Mostly generic questions and your experience as a sales person and how to handle challenging customers
Interview Questions: 1. Tell me about yourself

title: Academic Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CDI College (Calgary, AB) in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: I had a Zoom interview with the academic director. Started on time, went a few minutes over to discuss salary and possible start dates. However, there was no contact after the zoom interview. Not even to tell me I didn't get the job.
Interview Questions: I was asked about experience

title: Admissions Manager Interview
Application Type: The process took 3 days. I interviewed at CDI College in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted via Indeed and was told that I may be a good fit. I asked about the compensation but received no response. Instead I received an email prompting me to book a phone interview. I picked a time and received confirmation. I waited for the call on the date and time and never received a call. I emailed the recruiter to double check if I had the right time despite knowing that it for sure was, as I had the confirmation in front of me. No reply. Messaged via Indeed that I was disappointed at the sheer lack of professionalism.  If that was any indication of what it is to work here, I am glad I dodged that bullet.
Interview Questions: None since the person never showed.

title: Assistant Director of Admissions Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CDI College (Vancouver, BC) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions:
I had 2 phone interviews a few months back - one screening phone call and one actual interview - quick and straightforward.
They didn't ask so many questions and the process was easy.
The interviewers were knowledgeable and made me feel comfortable.
Interview Questions: They asked about my previous targets in a sales position

title: Assistant Director of Admissions Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at CDI College
Interview Descriptions: Unprofessional phone interview.  HR did not call you on time for the phone interview.  She is 15 minutes late to make a call.  She just want to hang up the phone immediately.
Interview Questions: Please tell me about yourself

title: Student Finance Planner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at CDI College (Calgary, AB) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interviewer was very concise and thorough.  She was rather attractive.  Hope I get this job.  The questions are standard interview questions.  It seemed like she was asking me very casual questions.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths

title: Financial Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CDI College in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: Interview was good and easy and it was booked for 30min. The question were like if I can call a student up for some information / details. I have to work in office is that ok for me in this covid time.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and weaknesses?

title: Assistant Director of Admissions Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at CDI College (Calgary, AB) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process contained a lot of questions in regards to my past experience that was relevant to the job requirement. I was placed in different scenarios to see how i would handle certain situations
Interview Questions: If a customer was wrongly angry and complaining, how do you handle that sitation

title: Admissions Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CDI College in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was great, and very straightforward. As long as you come in prepared and confident then it will go well. I was interviewed on two separate occasions before I got the job
Interview Questions: I dont remember at the moment.

title: Assistant Director of Admissions Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CDI College
Interview Descriptions: For this position, it requires you to sell  at least 12 programs per month. I was being told there is like 10 people working in the same position? It’s very competitive position.
Interview Questions: What’s your sale target in your former company

title: Office Assistant for the Registrar Office Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CDI College
Interview Descriptions: It was a phone interview and recuiter called me. it went like 30 minutes and she expalined about the job first. It was very easy going interview. I have not went through the actual interview yet but they will schedule the interview if I make it to the next round. the recruiter asked general questions as well.
Interview Questions: why do you want this job

title: Planificateur Interview

depot de cv entretien en ligne apres avoir examiné le cv ils vous appelent avec un check liste
via le telephone et ce durant la pandimie, apres ils vous posent aussi des question pour ton anglais

title: Instructor of Medical Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at CDI College (Calgary, AB) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: I applied the job on Indeed. I got the interview invitation about 1 week afterward. The process of this interview was about 20 mins. It started with tell me about yourself and came with a few behavioural questions.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your weakness

title: Student Financial Planner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CDI College in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: First was the telephonic round and then it progressed to a zoom video interview. The duration for both was around 20 mins each.  the interviewee was warm and welcoming and asked basic questions as per the job description.
Interview Questions: Tell me something about yourself

title: Financial Planner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at CDI College
Interview Descriptions: Applied online via indeed, receive an email for interview with the campus director, very nice interview.  Also talked with finance coordinator, people are very nice and friendly. Applied online via indeed, receive an email for interview with the campus director, very nice interview.  Also talked with finance coordinator, people are very nice and friendly.
Interview Questions: introduce yourself

title: Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CDI College (Toronto, ON) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interviewer made me feel comfortable and was willing to answer my questions. I was able to meet colleagues and tour the campus. They were flexible with my requests and were able address my concerns.
Interview Questions: What made you want to apply for this position.

title: Web Design Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at CDI College (Montreal, QC) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: Applied via Indeed Job portal, after a month, I got an email about the phone screening interview, gave availability and got the phone call and review my application. It was very easy and formal process and because of COVID-19 , I haven't met any recruiter yet.
Interview Questions: They called me and asked about the previous experience in the teaching field, asked why you want to be an instructor and after two days I got an offer.

title: Finance Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at CDI College (Calgary, AB) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: interviewee was straight to the point and told me the salary over the phone and how the job is a lot of work and asked if that was okay
Interview Questions: salary, why you wanna work there

title: Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at CDI College (Calgary, AB) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: Phone prelim interview and then live with two directors which took just over 30 mins. They hired me within the week and there was an email negotiation regarding terms because the offer was very vague at first. Then I was given two weeks training time but the other instructor was absent from the building very often. I was hired first as an instructor part time and then given full time after a month w an addiction role as Student Services Coordinator. I was let go at end of probation due to toxic class room environment.
Interview Questions: How would you deal with students who are all in different academic places in the program

title: Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at CDI College (Richmond, BC)
Interview Descriptions: Phone conversation followed up by a meeting. Friendly and conversational rather than questionnaire type questions.  Interviewed by admin and coordinator.  Decision on hiring was done on the spot ( no waiting and wondering). Very clear on the contract offered and expectations.
Interview Questions: My experience as a teacher

title: Admissions Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at CDI College (Mississauga, ON)
Interview Descriptions: Questions were asked related to previous education, experience, strength, weaknesses etc. Most of it were general questions. It was one on one interview with the Director. I was very positive during the interview process as I was given very positive information about CDI College, but while I was working there I realized information shared with me about it was not real.
Interview Questions: Questions related to Previous experience were asked

title: Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CDI College (Ajax, ON)
Interview Descriptions: Talked with the Campus Director for an hour. We discussed a variety of personal opinions on the future of education in Ontario. Afterward, He gave me a campus tour, and briefly explained the job expectations. A couple of weeks later he called and informed me that the program had been approved by corporate and I could start on an agreed upon date. I went in to provide him with references, and fill out the paper work, and returned on the start date.
Interview Questions: Informal interview

title: Addiction Counselor/Community Support Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at CDI College (Edmonton, AB) in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: After the silly little exam they give you to ensure that you can read and write they didn't have the sense to ensure that my prerequisites were adequate.  I was pulled aside 2/ 3 of the way through the course and told to go back to high school and then I could get my diploma from them..........
Interview Questions: IF only they had asked. ."may we please have a copy of your high school transcripts"?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CDI College (Victoria, BC) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: Had two interviews, both in person. First was with the financial adviser; basic questions. Second was about a week later with the Director of the campus; similar questions and more conversational.
Interview Questions: What can you bring to this team?

title: Receptionist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at CDI College (Surrey, BC) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions: not proffesional way, they call me ask if i can workright away i said no. the call me again the nextmorning and said they will hire me and i can start intwo weeks

title: Instructor Interview

Interview Descriptions: Presentation followed with technical interview.
